name: Shard of Kronos
description:
The ever peaceful sky lands of Tygardia are being threatened by a destructive meteor. This meteor can only be destroyed by activating an ancient beacon, guarded by monsters and puzzles. Can you prevent this mysterious catastrophe from happening?

Shard of Kronos is a third-person adventure game where you need to save the world by solving various puzzles using your bow and arrow and a vision-enhancing ability. You follow the story of Eden Siegfried, a young, talented, and an exceptionally skilled archer.


    [* Beautiful aesthetics and atmosphere]
    [* Pleasing soundtracks ]
    [* Deep story and a satisfying vision-enhancing mechanic ]
